Text: Took me a long time before I finally found this gem of a movie ;) enjoy! Dual soundtracks Catalan and English!
the video quality is great but how do i make it english id normally just dowload somewhere else but alas i cant find this movie anywhere else
To change the language, in Media Player Classic - Home Cinema, click Play / Audio and then select Stream 01 (Cat) or Stream 02 (Eng)
